citation.article-title: Desulfacinum hydrothermale sp. nov., a thermophilic, sulfate-reducing bacterium from geothermally heated sediments near Milos Island (Greece).
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the genus Desulfacinum (Rees et al. 1995, 88)
The sentence regarding motility should be changed to: `Oval cells, which may be motile or non-motile'.
